activities:
InsideSales.com, Inc. receives (from its customers) database entries that may include any or all of the following relative to our customers’ leads or customers:  Name, address, telephone number, e-mail address, fax number, credit card information, employer name.  The information is used for our customers’ purposes in contacting their customers or leads and tracking the details and quality of such contacts.  InsideSales.com, Inc., also de-identifies and aggregates the data entered into our software for purposes of determining statistics and best practices, such as most effective time of day to call persons residing in a particular geography or working in a particular industry. 

Data in the systems is backed up monthly and stored on media kept in a locked environment with stringent access restrictions.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organization, client, customer, all of which may be manually processed
